charges.charge_description: Did Knowingly And Intentionally Attempt to Distribute Approximately 1 Gram of Cocaine, 21 Usc 841(A)(1), 841(B0(1)(C) And 846. Date of Offense: 9/1/02 And 9/26/02 Penalty: Not More Than 20 Years Imprisonment, A Fine of up to $1 Million, at Least 3 Years Srt, $100 Special Assessment, And Community Restitution up to The Amount of Any Fine Imposed by The Court. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 12 Mos &; 1 Day Bop, 3 Years Srt, $100.00 Special Assessment
